item.title: 7th Annual Innovation Game Design Competition - Best Game Script Award
item.description: Official Website https://gamecompetition.org/ Championship outline Name: 7th Annual Innovation Game Design Competition Organizer: Internatinal Games System Cooperation: NTHU / NTU / NCCU / NTUST Date: 22 January 2022 Venue: National Taiwan University of Science and Technology (Taipei, Taiwan) Rules: Unity2D, Unity3D Final Result The PTSD - Best Game Script Award Certificate
